content.description:
SDS to The Taint of Truth.

 Sit start on good pockets. Make a move left to a good edge and then lock off to a small right hand crimp. Throw a semi-desperate move to a good shelf on the left and then move up through the rest of ToT.
content.location: Left side of Loch Ness boulder.

content.description:
Start matched mid-face standing on top of the boulder on a good edge.  You kind of have to step your feet down from the top of the boulder to get on.  Move up and right on a couple of small crimps and another good edge to the topout. 

  It also seems possible to start sitting down on the right using some combination of the pockets found there.  I found the holds between the SDS and the hold I started on to be rather unpleasant though.
content.protection: The boulder underneath you is a bit treacherous but a pad should do.
content.location: On the face directly left of Lochness arete

content.description: The face to the right of Loch Ness Arete.
content.location: Face to right of LNA.  From Deer Cove parking, walk east along the road (away from boat launch parking) and look up and left while walking.  When you see a sweet boulder about 50 feet up off the road, you're there.

content.description: SS on the jug directly on the arete. Climb up using arete and some stuff just to the left as well.
content.location: from the Deer Cove Picnic parking area go to your right for maybe 10 feet and you'll see a perfect arete in the woods to your left.

content.description: Sit start on a jug on the right side of the face. Make a long move up left to a jug and top it out.
content.location: Face to the right of Creature of the Deep

content.description: Stand start on the corner to the right of Sasquatch Face, and balance your way up the arete
Larger boulder you can see easily- look uphill from the road just past Deer Cove parking.
